name: RevengeOfTheBlobsTD
description:
Are you sick of boring TD games with lack of enemies and towers. Welcome to the revenge of the blobs a TD game where the enemy continuously spawn until the level is over.  This is a demo to play for free. There are loads of unique enemies that are not in other games. Don't forget about the towers too. For the future there are planned to be bonus levels that are more challenging than the Just for the demo, there are 12 levels and 2 bonus levels. Also, let me know if you think there is something that should be changed. The demo might not feel like much but I am planned with loads of wacky and challenging enemies along the way. The price is expected to be very cheap definitely under 2.50$

If you would like to review this game here's a forum of what you think about it

https://forms.gle/d8JKWYFK9GkJ8obF9

Here's also a bestiary of Enemies and Towers

https://sites.google.com/d/1wnNHrMBv3HIDQBufKeA8KR2p1n6fQhi9/p/18H5Yr36dGkrajK4i...

Please let me know if any of these links don't work thanks.

Here's a donate link to donate if you feel like it.
